#summary A description of the gObject Management System components.

= Introduction =

The gObject Management System consists of 3 main components:

  # A [Map HTML page using Google Maps]. Fills in contents from XML-files implemented in [PHPFiles PHP].
  # A [Database MySQL database] storing the management information
  # A set of [LinuxUtilities Linux scripts] collecting management information from the wireless nodes
